definition.text: What you just went through is the definition of the Limit Buy Order that is placed and cancelled every minute until it gets filled.

paragraphs.text: This is the node that determines the rate of the limit order. Remember what we discussed earlier about placing the order at the rate of the fourth support level?
Go to the Formula attached to the Order Rate node and click Edit on the menu.
Well... that is how it's done! As you can see, the syntax is virtually self-explanatory! It involves defining the time frame, the indicator, and the indicator property involved.
